

Roadmap NLP

##Machine learning
Cleaning the input -Tokeniazation, Lemmatization
Input text -> vectors - Bow, TF IDF
Input -> vectors - Word2Vec, AvgWord2Vec

Librarys for ML - NLTK, Spacy

##Deep learning
Neural n/w - RNN, LSTM RNN, GRU RNN
Word embedding
BERT

LDA
tokenaziation
LLM
